name: Hell Down Under
description:
(Hell Down Under Contains Adult Themes. It Will Have NSFW Scenes Later in the Story. Reader Discretion is Advised [18+].)

Hell Down Under is a story-driven, romance visual novel set in the sprawling lands of Hell itself.  And the Devil's set his eyes on you.

Hell is a wonderful place. Or, at least, so it seems. When you wake up in Hell, you only know three things for certain. Your name; that there's a devil waiting for you nearby; and whatever you thought Hell was? Completely wrong.

The charming Devil of Fort Hell has yielded a near-utopia thanks to his diligent leadership.  But there's something brewing in the Hellscape out there... something you shouldn't be too keen on finding.

Every newcomer at Fort Hell has a role. Certainly yours will be simple... right?

...

This is a linear story. Currently, Devil is the only planned romanceable character, but there may be 1-3 more in the future.

IMPORTANT: This is a demo. CGs and sketches will be included as they are finished, along with additional edits and changes. Everything is subject to change.
